name: Trolley Folly (alexsussy)
description:
The classic trolley problem. What will you choose? 

Features:  
- Moral dilemmas.
- Hand drawn art.
- 15 unique endings.
- You can pet the dog.

Controls:
- Movement: WASD
- Pickup: E
- Interact: R

Credits:
- Alex Sussman: Brains
- Cole O'Brien: Brains
- Sarah Babski: Brains
- Andrea Cabral: Eyes
- Sadie Saunders: Eyes
